location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 16: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 13 February 1779, via Major George Thompson, discusses the capture of an English vessel by Shaikh Rashed of Julphar [Galfar] and expresses the hope that the measures for its restitution will be successful and will lead to the return of the packets from the Company at Bombay.
